general.description: Numin is a testing ground for the ships produced on Mord, the Proteron's largest shipbuilding and research planet. Ships can be seen flying to and from here, and this is the closest that a civilian can get to Mord.
general.bar: While most of the bar is people going about their tasks, there are most certainly a few gawpers staring at the vivid dogfights and stress-testing rounds going on above.
